articles.author: Gavin D. J. Harper
articles.title: China's gallium and germanium controls: what they mean and what could happen next - The Conversation
articles.description: Welcome to the new age of resource nationalism.
articles.content: From August, China is to restrict exports of gallium and germanium, two critical elements for making semiconductor chips. With China dominating the supply of both elements, exporters will now need sp… [+6606 chars]
